subject: fix(ui): remove site header, add email debug modal
body:
Remove the separate site header ("this is a cv" + Alpha badge) which
created a competing h1 and used developer jargon that confused
non-technical users. Action buttons (Install, PDF) now live in the
Hero component where they contextually belong.

Add an EmailDebugModal component for diagnosing email send failures
on mobile. Activated via ?debug=true URL parameter â€” captures full
request/response lifecycle with timestamps, HTTP status, elapsed time,
and response bodies. Includes copy-to-clipboard for individual entries
or all logs.
